events.message: I would like to request a refund for the headphones I purchased last week because they were not what I expected.
The issue was identified as a refund request related to a recent purchase by the customer.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah to manage the refund process for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the headphones.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the headphones?
My order number is #456783 and the headphones don’t fit well and the sound quality is poorer than expected.
Thank you for the info. I can process a full refund once you return the headphones using the prepaid shipping label I will send you.
That sounds great, thanks for the quick help. I will send them back as soon as I get the label.
I have emailed you the prepaid return label. Please send the headphones back and the refund will be processed promptly.
Just checking in to see if you were able to send the headphones back and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
I mailed the headphones yesterday and look forward to receiving the refund. Thanks for following up.
We have received the returned headphones and your refund has been processed. You should see the amount credited shortly.
Thank you for contacting support. The refund case is now closed. Please reach out if you need help in the future.
